DOC.brief_summary: To investigate dose-response relationship DE-104 ophthalmic solution lower intraocular pressure ( IOP ) subject Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study DE-104 Ophthalmic Solution Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed primary openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension . Provided sign , write informed consent . If subject female childbearing potential , must utilize reliable contraceptive throughout study , must negative urine pregnancy test prior enrollment study . Females pregnant , nurse planning pregnancy , females childbearing potential use reliable method contraception . Presence abnormality significant illness could expect interfere study .
